alert.note: Alert for Defiance; Paulding (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 01 at 6:45PM EDT until June 01 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR PUTNAM...SOUTHEASTERN DEFIANCE...SOUTHEASTERN PAULDING AND SOUTHEASTERN HENRY COUNTIES... At 645 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Continental, or 11 miles northwest of Ottawa, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ottawa, Leipsic, Deshler, Kalida, Continental, Holgate, Glandorf, Oakwood, Hamler, Dupont, Malinta, West Leipsic, Gilboa, Cloverdale, Belmore, Miller City, New Bavaria, Arthur, Ayersville and Wisterman. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Northern Indiana.
